layer at (0,0) size 800x600
  LayoutView at (0,0) size 800x600
layer at (0,0) size 800x84
  LayoutBlockFlow {HTML} at (0,0) size 800x84
    LayoutBlockFlow {BODY} at (8,16) size 784x52
      LayoutBlockFlow {OL} at (0,0) size 784x52
        LayoutListItem {LI} at (40,0) size 744x52
          LayoutListMarker (anonymous) at (-16,16) size 16x19: "1"
          LayoutText {#text} at (16,16) size 549x19
            text run at (16,16) width 549: "A single outline should only appear over the list element, and not over internal text elements."
